Emperor majestically says 'Beloved concubine, you just entered the palace, tonight I'll teach you how to serve the emperor' walking toward dragon bed$time
Noble consort with seductive eyes says 'Young guard, you're so handsome, why not come to my palace for night duty?'$time
Princess whispers secretly 'Great hero, I want to elope with you, but before leaving, let us spend one last night'$time
General's wife says 'Vice-general, the general isn't in the mansion, come to my room to discuss military affairs' sending flirtatious glances$time
Prime minister's daughter teasingly says 'Little scholar, you've read so many sage books, do you understand bedroom pleasure?'$time
Empress domineeringly says 'Male concubine, I'm in a good mood today, come to the dragon bed and serve me well'$time
Princess shyly says 'Guard brother, the moonlight is beautiful, shall we go to the back garden to admire the moon?' taking his hand$time
Empress dowager gently says 'Crown princess, you'll serve the crown prince, let me teach you bedroom secrets'$time
Female warrior heartily says 'Young hero, staying at the inn tonight, why don't we share a room for mutual care'$time
Courtesan says 'Young master, you chose me tonight, let this servant serve you well' undressing$time
Female swordsman coldly says 'Wanderer, we met in the martial world, one night as husband and wife, tomorrow we go separate ways'$time
County magistrate's wife says 'Pretty boy, if you want to continue eating and using my things, you must serve me well'$time
Alliance leader's daughter says 'Enemy, I married you by father's will, but tonight I want you to know my power'$time
Imperial concubine whispers 'Grand eunuch, though you're a eunuch, I know your secret, come to my palace'$time
Young mistress says 'Servant, no one's in the mansion, come to my room to help me change clothes' with ambiguous eyes$time
Female escort says 'Customer, it's unsafe to sleep in the wild at night, how about we embrace for warmth' lighting campfire$time
Emperor after discovering says 'Bold palace maid, daring to have an affair, now you must accept my punishment' removing dragon robe$time
Merchant's daughter says 'Poor scholar, I'm willing to sponsor your trip to the capital for exams, but first you must satisfy me'$time
Female bandit leader says 'Pretty boy, this leader has taken a fancy to you, now you're my captive husband'$time
Abbess in deep night says 'Amitabha, tonight the moon is full, breaking precepts once won't matter' removing monk robes$time
Female physician says 'Patient, your condition is special, I need to treat you personally' closing clinic door$time
Opera actress says 'Master, you like my performance, how about I give you a private show tonight'$time
Widow says 'Young man, I've been widowed for years, if you don't mind, you can come to my room tonight'$time
Female gambler after losing everything says 'Gambler, I have no money left, how about paying debt with my body?' loosening dress$time
Tavern proprietress says 'Young waiter, all guests have left tonight, come to my room to settle accounts' with seductive eyes$time
Capital courtesan says 'Scholar, your poetry is excellent, tonight let this servant offer herself to you'$time
Female mountain bandit says 'Passerby, to pass this mountain, leave toll money or pay with your body'$time
Taoist nun after descending mountain says 'Benefactor, this poor nun just descended the mountain, doesn't understand worldly love, please teach me'$time
Prime minister's wife says 'Lover, my husband went to court, we have one hour' undressing$time
Border general's daughter says 'Today I turn eighteen, father said to hold coming-of-age ceremony for me, you come teach me'$time
